summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 9%) and rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 763 m), feels like temperature (up 1.7°C), and inside temperature (up 1.8°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 735.5m higher than yesterday, 169.4m lower than the past week, 762.9m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 765m minimum and 2220m maximum, with an average of 2000m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 2170m and 2760m.
cloud levels.summary: The clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, the air will feel quite humid. Chance of light rain, the clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected, and bright sunshine will dominate the day. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
